summary:
Draco: My Lord, what's your opinion about LGBTQ?
Voldemort: I say kill all prejudices about gender discrimination. Everyone's...
body:
Draco: My Lord, what’s your opinion about LGBTQ?

Voldemort: I say kill all prejudices about gender discrimination. Everyone’s equal in the eyes of death. Death does not discriminate. So, what power does mere muggles have towards gender races?

Draco: So, you have just gave me your approval?

Voldemort: Of what?

Draco: I’m gay for Potter, My Lord.

Voldemort: What?

Harry: … What?

Lucius: *sighs

icon made by @willhsrondale on twitter

title: Snapdragons
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LUxiAK

by DarkBlue

“No, I don’t want purple snapdragons for my funeral, Sirius.”
“What do you want?” Sirius asked in the silence, and it became very brittle, and very strained. The four looked at each other, suddenly wide-eyed and scared. There was a war on, after all. And three of them, at least, had joined up. They were of age.

Words: 2647, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: rantreader
blog.title: Ranting Reader
blog.description: I love to read and want to rant about what I'm reading. Expect random thoughts and review.

summary: #alwaysreadhp18 Day Two Favourite character It might be an obvious one but god damn it I love Hermione so much. For one she made...
body:
#alwaysreadhp18 Day Two

Favourite character

It might be an obvious one but god damn it I love Hermione so much. For one she made nerdy hard work and love for information cool. During this reread, I really understand why she’s Gryffindor. She stands by her own convictions even if it would be easier for her not to and she cares so much for others.

She bloody chose Cookshranks because it was unlikely he would be adopted by someone else. She called out Trawney and manages to do as many subjects as possible - even using time travel - because she wants to learn as much as possible. And let’s not forget about S.P.E.W. 

Hermione is the best role model. She works hard, stands by her own convictions and has a strong moral conscious.

#alwaysreadhp18 Day Two

Favourite character

It might be an obvious one but god damn it I love Hermione so much. For one she made nerdy hard work and love for information cool. During this reread, I really understand why she’s Gryffindor. She stands by her own convictions even if it would be easier for her not to and she cares so much for others.

She bloody chose Cookshranks because it was unlikely he would be adopted by someone else. She called out Trawney and manages to do as many subjects as possible - even using time travel - because she wants to learn as much as possible. And let’s not forget about S.P.E.W. 

Hermione is the best role model. She works hard, stands by her own convictions and has a strong moral conscious.

*silence*
